p: Plants damaged by specialist A. hygrophila showed significantly lower total biomass (-6.8%) ( Table 2, Fig 2). Herbivory also significantly decreased branch intensity (-18.6%) and specific leaf area (-3.5%) ( Table 2, Figs 3 and 4). There was no significant effect of herbivory by shading interaction on all traits measured ( Table 2, Figs 2, 3 and 4).
